mapper.select: select ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, RIGHTS, PARENT_ID, ADD_QX, DEL_QX, EDIT_QX, CHA_QX, QX_ID, PARENT_ID from sys_role where PARENT_ID != '7'
select ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, RIGHTS, PARENT_ID, ADD_QX, DEL_QX, EDIT_QX, CHA_QX, QX_ID from sys_role where PARENT_ID = '7'
select USER_ID from sys_user where ROLE_ID = #{ROLE_ID}
select USER_ID from sys_user where ROLE_ID!='1' and ROLE_ID like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{ROLE_ID}),'%')
select USER_ID from sys_app_user where ROLE_ID = #{ROLE_ID}

SELECT b.GL_ID, b.ROLE_ID, b.FX_QX, b.FW_QX, b.QX1, b.QX2, b.QX3, b.QX4 from sys_role a, sys_gl_qx b, sys_user c where a.QX_ID = b.GL_ID and a.ROLE_ID = c.ROLE_ID and c.ROLE_ID = '${ROLE_ID}'
limit 0,1
SELECT b.U_ID, b.C1, b.C2, b.C3, b.C4, b.Q1, b.Q2, b.Q3, b.Q4 from sys_role a, sys_user_qx b, sys_user c where a.QX_ID = b.U_ID and a.ROLE_ID = c.ROLE_ID and c.ROLE_ID = '${ROLE_ID}' limit 0,1
select GL_ID, ROLE_ID, FX_QX, FW_QX, QX1, QX2, QX3, QX4 from sys_gl_qx
select U_ID, C1, C2, C3, C4, Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4 from sys_user_qx
mapper.update: update sys_role set ADD_QX=#{ADD_QX}, DEL_QX=#{DEL_QX}, EDIT_QX=#{EDIT_QX}, CHA_QX=#{CHA_QX}, RIGHTS=#{RIGHTS} where PARENT_ID=#{ROLE_ID}
update sys_role set ADD_QX=#{ADD_QX}, DEL_QX=#{DEL_QX}, EDIT_QX=#{EDIT_QX}, CHA_QX=#{CHA_QX}, RIGHTS=#{RIGHTS} where ROLE_ID=#{ROLE_ID}
mapper.select: select ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, RIGHTS, PARENT_ID, ADD_QX, DEL_QX, EDIT_QX, CHA_QX, QX_ID from sys_role where PARENT_ID = '0' ORDER BY ROLE_ID
select ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, RIGHTS, PARENT_ID, ADD_QX, DEL_QX, EDIT_QX, CHA_QX, QX_ID from sys_role where PARENT_ID = #{ROLE_ID} ORDER BY ROLE_ID
mapper.insert: insert into sys_gl_qx ( GL_ID, ROLE_ID, FX_QX, FW_QX, QX1, QX2, QX3, QX4 ) values ( #{GL_ID}, #{ROLE_ID}, #{FX_QX}, #{FW_QX}, #{QX1}, #{QX2}, #{QX3}, #{QX4} )
insert into sys_user_qx ( U_ID, C1, C2, C3, C4, Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4 ) values ( #{U_ID}, #{C1}, #{C2}, #{C3}, #{C4}, #{Q1}, #{Q2}, #{Q3}, #{Q4} )

insert into sys_role ( ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, RIGHTS, PARENT_ID, ADD_QX, DEL_QX, EDIT_QX, CHA_QX, QX_ID, TYPE ) values ( #{ROLE_ID}, #{ROLE_NAME}, #{RIGHTS}, #{PARENT_ID}, #{ADD_QX}, #{DEL_QX}, #{EDIT_QX}, #{CHA_QX}, #{QX_ID}, #{TYPE} )
mapper.select: select ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, RIGHTS, PARENT_ID, ADD_QX, DEL_QX, EDIT_QX, CHA_QX, TYPE from sys_role where ROLE_ID = #{ROLE_ID}
select ROLE_NAME from sys_role where ROLE_ID=#{ROLE_ID}

select TYPE from sys_role where ROLE_ID in
#{role_id}
